name: Rescue the Bunnies
description:
Rescue the Bunnies is a roguelike-style game about a rabbit who seeks to save his family from the clutches of a monster.

But for that, he will have to face  a lot of obstacles on his way. Is he capable?

Game Mechanics:
  • Like many Top-Down games, Rescue the Bunnies consists of moving the rabbit using 'WASD' keys and controlling the direction of the attack using the mouse.
  • The farther you go, the darker it gets! -  Rescue the Bunnies has light mechanics, giving it a dark atmosphere.
  • Rescue the Bunnies focuses on swords rather than weapons, giving more tension in the short stages.
  • There is the shield system, where there are different shields with different effects.
System Requirements:

MINIMUM:

  • SO: Windows 7+
  • Processos: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB  RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB of available space
Thanks for your interest =)
